text: Apani ki dekhena na, allaha akasa hate bari barsana karena, atahpara ta bhumite nirjhararupe prabahita karena tarapara ta dbara bibidha barnera phasala utpanna karena, tarapara ta sukiye yaya. Phale apani ta haluda barna dekhate pana, abasese tini setake khara-kutoya parinata karena? Ete abasya'i upadesa rayeche bodhasaktisampannadera jan'ya
